member.name: T:formulate.meta.Constants
member.summary: Constants relating to Formulate itself (i.e., does not include constants used by Formulate).

member.name: F:formulate.meta.Constants.Version
member.summary: This is the version of Formulate. It is used on assemblies and during the creation of the installer package.
member.remarks: Do not reformat this code. A grunt task reads this version number with a regular expression.

member.name: F:formulate.meta.Constants.PackageName
member.summary: The name of the Formulate package.

member.name: F:formulate.meta.Constants.PackageNameCamelCase
member.summary: The name of the Formulate package, in camel case.
